name: hyperspy-base
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.16.3
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: hyperspy-base
    version: 1.4.1
source:

    sha256: 1527bc374e539b07d64e6d95ac30b351c3e9ed0183886084b993f70c696045d9
    url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/h/hyperspy/hyperspy-1.4.1.tar.gz
build:
    noarch: false
    number: '1'
    script: install.sh
    string: py36h1de35cc_1
requirements:
    build:
        - cctools 895 h7512d6f_0
        - clang 4.0.1 h662ec87_0
        - clang_osx-64 4.0.1 h1ce6c1d_11
        - compiler-rt 4.0.1 h5487866_0
        - ld64 274.2 h7c2db76_0
        - libcxx 4.0.1 h579ed51_0
        - libcxxabi 4.0.1 hebd6815_0
        - llvm 4.0.1 hc748206_0
        - llvm-lto-tapi 4.0.1 h6701bc3_0
    host:
        - ca-certificates 2018.10.15 ha4d7672_0
        - certifi 2018.8.24 py36_1001
        - cython 0.29.1 py36h0a44026_1000
        - libcxx 4.0.1 hcfea43d_1
        - libcxxabi 4.0.1 hcfea43d_1
        - libffi 3.2.1 h0a44026_1005
        - ncurses 6.1 h0a44026_1001
        - openssl 1.0.2p h1de35cc_1001
        - pip 18.0 py36_1001
        - python 3.6.7 h4a56312_1001
        - readline 7.0 hcfe32e1_1001
        - setuptools 40.4.0 py36_1000
        - sqlite 3.25.3 h1765d9f_1000
        - tk 8.6.9 ha441bb4_1000
        - wheel 0.31.1 py36_1001
        - xz 5.2.4 h1de35cc_1001
        - zlib 1.2.11 h1de35cc_1003
    run:
        - dask >=0.18
        - dill
        - h5py
        - ipyparallel
        - ipython
        - jupyter
        - matplotlib >2.2.2
        - natsort
        - numba
        - numexpr
        - numpy >1.13
        - pint >0.8
        - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
        - python-dateutil >=2.5
        - requests
        - scikit-image >=0.13
        - scikit-learn
        - scipy >=0.15
        - sparse
        - statsmodels
        - sympy
        - tqdm >=0.4.9
        - traits >=4.5
test:
    commands:
        - export MPLBACKEND=agg
        - pytest --pyargs hyperspy --mpl
    imports:
        - hyperspy
        - hyperspy.Release
        - hyperspy._components
        - hyperspy._signals
        - hyperspy.api
        - hyperspy.api_nogui
        - hyperspy.axes
        - hyperspy.component
        - hyperspy.components1d
        - hyperspy.components2d
        - hyperspy.datasets
        - hyperspy.decorators
        - hyperspy.defaults_parser
        - hyperspy.docstrings
        - hyperspy.drawing
        - hyperspy.drawing._markers
        - hyperspy.drawing._widgets
        - hyperspy.events
        - hyperspy.exceptions
        - hyperspy.external
        - hyperspy.external.astroML
        - hyperspy.external.mpfit
        - hyperspy.interactive
        - hyperspy.io
        - hyperspy.io_plugins
        - hyperspy.learn
        - hyperspy.logger
        - hyperspy.misc
        - hyperspy.misc.eds
        - hyperspy.misc.eels
        - hyperspy.misc.holography
        - hyperspy.misc.io
        - hyperspy.misc.machine_learning
        - hyperspy.model
        - hyperspy.models
        - hyperspy.roi
        - hyperspy.samfire
        - hyperspy.samfire_utils
        - hyperspy.samfire_utils.goodness_of_fit_tests
        - hyperspy.samfire_utils.segmenters
        - hyperspy.samfire_utils.weights
        - hyperspy.signal
        - hyperspy.signal_tools
        - hyperspy.signals
        - hyperspy.ui_registry
        - hyperspy.utils
    requires:
        - matplotlib <3.0
        - pytest
        - pytest-mpl
about:
    dev_url: https://github.com/hyperspy/hyperspy/
    doc_url: http://hyperspy.org/hyperspy-doc/current/user_guide/index.html
    home: https://hyperspy.org
    license: GPL v3
    license_file: COPYING.txt
    summary: Multi-dimensional data analysis
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - francisco-dlp
        - to266
